1.title: In Plain Sight

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: While searching for gemstones. Johann drives Hiccup to the Sandbuster's lair and Johann helps Hiccup find all the required gems and then Johann reveals his deception and demands Hiccup the dragon eye lenses.

2.title: No Bark, All Bite

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Stoick and Hiccup argue as Stoick is determined to procure willow bark for Berk while Hiccup has a nagging suspicion that all is not what it seems. Three traders compete to become Berk's new supplier.

3.title: Chain of Command

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: The Riders host a meeting on Defenders of the Wing Island to discuss the threat Johann poses, however, Dagur and Mala constantly disagree with each other's ideas. Through Ruffnut and Tuffnut's mediation, Dagur and Mala actually get along and develop a mutual attraction for one another. Meanwhile, Hiccup and Snotlout travel to Wingmaiden Island to escort Atali to the meeting, where Atali leaves her second-in-command, Minden, in charge of the island, though Minden is upset at not being allowed to attend the meeting as well. When a fire breaks out on the other side of ...

4.title: Loyal Order of Ingerman

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: After learning his ancestors were dragon hunters who killed off the Dramillions, Fishlegs sets out to Dramillion Island with Astrid (against Hiccups wishes) to find and help protect the Dramillions from harm. Before setting out, he remembers his dragon scouts are coming and leaves the twins to look after them. After arriving, he immediately finds one and tries to train but discovers it is very aggressive and has the unusual ability to mimic the fire blasts of other dragons, such as a Gronkle's lava blast and Nadder's magnesium fire breath. While searching the island ...

5.title: A Gruff Seperation

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Hiccup grows weary when Gruffnut arrives on the twins' 19th birthday to administer a Thorston coming of age ritual involving three dangerous challenges.

6.title: Mi Amore Wing

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: While wondering what to do with loads of scrap metal, Dagur and Mala arrive on the Edge to announce that Dagur has completed Mala's king trials and are to be wed. After hearing this, Astrid starts to think that Hiccup isn't interested in her anymore since they are not as publicly affectionate as Dagur and Mala and begins to question her relationship with him. After deciding that the Armowing will make the best use of their spare scrap metal, Hiccup, Astrid (wearing Hiccup's Betrothal necklace), Snotlout, Fishlegs and Dagur go to the island to find the dragon. After ...

7.title: Ruff Transition

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: While visiting Wingmaiden Island, the Riders get to witness the ceremony where newly hatched baby Razorwhips choose their Wingmaidens. One baby ends up choosing Ruffnut, whom Atali insists must become a Wingmaiden. Though Ruffnut struggles with the tasks to care for her Razorwhip, named Wingnut, she only succeeds thanks to Tuffnut's secret assistance. Despite Atali's encouragement, Ruffnut is certain that she cannot be a Wingmaiden and that Wingnut is better off without her. When Flyers attack, Ruffnut rescues Wingnut and uses her newly learned Wingmaiden abilities to...

8.title: Triple Cross

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Viggo is betrayed by Johann but manage to stay alive and contact Hiccup in order to plot a double-cross scheme against Johann and Krogan.

9.title: Family Matters

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: The gang realize that Krogan uses DeathSong dragon to catch more SingeTail dragons, but when they free the dragons they don't fly away and the gang try to figure out why.

10.title: Darkest Night

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: In one of the Berkian patrols Stoick gets hurt, and when Hiccup heard about it he blamed himself all the way to the beginning of the Human-Dragon relationship.

11.title: Guardians of Vanaheim

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: The Flyers follow Heather Vanaheim and attack it, assuming the last lens is there, and leaving a great destruction. The Riders arrive just in time to clean the mess.

12.title: King of Dragons, Part 1

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: The Riders and the Flyers go to Dramilion island, led by the complete dragon eyes. And again, Hiccup realizes that Johann and Krogan are one step ahead of him and struggles to catch up.

13.title: King of Dragons, Part 2

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: The riders race to the home of the true King of Dragons. But the flyers are already there, and they soon come face to face with the legendary creature.

1.title: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Part One

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: During their search for the escaped Dagur the Deranged, the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object.

2.title: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Part Two

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds the key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

3.title: Imperfect Harmony

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

4.title: When Darkness Falls

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: The Dragon Riders finally select an island for their distant outpost, but Tuffnutt comes upon a colossal inhabitant that may change their minds.

5.title: Big Man on Berk

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Thinking he's allergic to his dragon, Fishlegs gets hypnotized. He wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

6.title: Gone Gustav Gone

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

7.title: Reign of Fireworms

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: Dragon's Edge is threatened, not just by the on coming swarm of Fireworms, but by Ruffnut and Tuffnut who discover they actually own the island that Dragon's Edge is on.

8.title: Crushing It

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: A Rumblehorn is wreaking havoc on Dragon's Edge. Meanwhile, Stoick is wreaking havoc back in Berk.

9.title: Quake, Rattle and Roll

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Fishlegs is excited to find the homeland of the Gronckles. Unfortunately the poor dragons are being terrorized by an unknown dragon. Fishlegs and Meatlug to the rescue.

10.title: Have Dragon Will Travel, Part One

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: At Berk, Hiccup finds out someone is attacking and luding ships. They take off to find a Dragon and a rider who is doing this. They find out information and go to the island to find a shocking discovery

11.title: Have Dragon Will Travel, Part Two

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

12.title: The Next Big Sting

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: The Dragon Riders find a wounded baby Speed Stinger. Bring on the mayhem as they try to capture it, nurse it back to health and return it to its pack.

13.title: Total Nightmare

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Hookfang finds a female Monstrous Nightmare and Snotlout becomes jealous of Hookfangs new relationship. Is this the end of their relationship? Is Snotlout never going to ride again?

1.title: Team Astrid

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid agrees to train a group of back up dragon riders. Little do they know they will soon be pressed into service.

2.title: Night of the Hunters, Part One

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: When Stormfly is captured by Dragon Hunters, a new villain emerges, Ryker Grimborn. Hiccup and the riders must find Stormfly and rescue her, before it's too late.

3.title: Night of the Hunters, Part Two

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the other riders from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters. Little do they know that Dagur and Heather are now working with the Hunters.

4.title: Bad Moon Rising

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: When a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he will turn into the legendary Lycanwing Dragon when the moon is full. Hiccup and the other riders must save him before Tuffnut goes off to live amongst the dragons forever.

5.title: Snotlout Gets the Axe

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: When Snotlout and Astrid are given the task of transporting a ceremonial battle-ax to a wedding between their two families, they must put aside their differences when a new type of dragon, the Armorwing, takes the ax.

6.title: The Zippleback Experience

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: When Hiccup and Toothless save the Zippleback's life, the grateful dragon abandons Ruff and Tuff, and follows Hiccup and Toothless trying to please them in any way possible.

7.title: Snow Way Out

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: Hiccup and the riders must stop Ryker from creating a key to the Dragon Eye, which means a return trip to Glacier Island. Only this time the Riders will be protecting the deadly Snow Wraith.

8.title: Edge of Disaster, Part One

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: When a distress call arrives at Dragon's Edge; Hiccup, Snotlout, and Fishlegs go to investigate. Astrid, Ruff and Tuff stay behind to keep watch and defend Dragon's Edge from the Dragon Hunters.

9.title: Edge of Disaster: Part Two

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Tuff and Astrid continue to defend Dragon's Edge, while Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of wounded dragons that have been hunted and hurt by the Dragon Hunters.

10.title: Shock and Awe

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: When a new tidal class dragon, the Sea Shocker, is found in Edge Cove, the riders must help it escape a group of hungry Scauldrons and reunite it with its migrating pod.

11.title: A Time to Skrill

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: The Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless. Hiccup and the Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon.

12.title: Maces and Talons, Part One

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: When Hiccup and Astrid learn that Heather has been taken into the confidence of the mysterious Viggo Grimborn, the Riders now have a real shot of bringing down the Dragon Hunters.

13.title: Maces and Talons, Part Two

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: With Heather and the Flightmare captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must learn to out think this dangerous new opponent.

1.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: While trying to take care of unfinished business, Hiccup and Toothless are lured into a trap. An unlikely rescuer comes to their aid.

2.title: Crash Course

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: A wounded dragon seeks the Dragon Riders' help in protecting a precious treasure trove against an unfamiliar creature with strange powers.

3.title: Follow the Leader

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: When things don't go well when Fishlegs is in charge, he gets another chance to prove he has what it takes to be a leader.

4.title: Turn and Burn

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: When a mysterious dragon attacks Spitelouts storehouse, Spitelout and Stoick have different ideas on what to do next.

5.title: Buffalord Soldier

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: When Astrid and Stormfly making an unusual discovery on a fishing boat, Astrid's life becomes dependent on one dragon, supposedly extinct. Can Hiccup find one of these peculiar dragons and save Astrid in time?

6.title: A Grim Retreat

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: When the Dragon Riders fly to an island on a vacation, a small creature there has a special effect on the dragons.

7.title: To Heather or Not to Heather

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: The dragon riders invite Heather to the edge secretly planning to ask her to join them. As Hiccup begins training them for the team Heather's dragon refuses to cooperate. Heather decides that it safer if the two of them leave. Fishlegs wants her to stay. Can he help Windshear adjust or will Heather leave the edge.

8.title: Stryke Out

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: When Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and Toothless is forced to fight other dragons for entertainment, the rest of the dragon riders must save them before it's too late.

9.title: Tone Death

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: The dragon riders take a dragon egg from the dragon hunters and they try to train the baby dragon. Will they be able to do it?

10.title: Between a Rock and a Hard Place

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: Viggo is building an impenetrable fortress that even dragons can't break through, it's up to Hiccup and the gang to stop him.

11.title: Family on the Edge

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Heather's brother Dagur shows up out of no where and asks Hiccup for help finding her. He wants to learn to ride dragons. Dagur sees Heather on the edge and goes the extra mile to protect her.

12.title: Last Auction Heroes

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: Snotlout is sent on an undercover mission to Viggo's dragon auction as part of a plan to rescue the dragons and stop Viggo from getting richer.

13.title: Defenders of the Wing, Part 1

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: The dragon riders meet Viggo to put an end to their fight. Viggo suggests hiccup to stay under the marked line in the map and that was his agreement. The dragon riders take time to think and decides to check what's up there in that area in the map. They set off to the island just above the line and are captured by a community known as the Defenders of the wing lead by Queen Mala. They doubt the riders being dragon hunters. The riders are put in prison. They try to explain but fail. The riders are sentenced to death but seeing their love towards the dragons and the ...

1.title: Defenders of the Wing, Part 2

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: To prove they're on the same side and pose no threat, the Dragon Riders try to rescue Queen Mala's dragon, which Viggo stole to destroy Dragon's Edge.

2.title: Gruff Around the Edges

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Tuffnut is eager to impress his visiting cousin, Gruffnut. But Ruffnut is suspicious of his real reasons for coming to Dragon's Edge.

3.title: Midnight Scrum

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: The Dragon Riders attend Berk's 400th anniversary celebration, where a bounty on Hiccup's head casts a dark shadow over the festivities.

4.title: Not Lout

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: After getting bad advice from his father, Snotlout tries to seize leadership of the Dragon Riders and starts making reckless decisions on his own.

5.title: Saving Shattermaster

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Hiccup and Heather are shocked to see Dagur among the Dragon Hunters. Snotlout undergoes the Trials, a series of tests he must pass to be Mala's king.

6.title: Dire Straits

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

7.title: The Longest Day

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

8.title: Gold Rush

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

9.title: Out of the Frying Pan

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

10.title: Twintuition

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

11.title: Blindsided

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: While rescuing the dragons from a fire in the stables caused by a powerful lightning storm, Astrid suffers an injury that leaves her blind.

12.title: Shell Shocked: Part 1

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: After months of planning, Hiccup launches an operation to capture the Dragon Eye from Viggo, only to find that someone else has beaten them to it.

13.title: Shell Shocked: Part 2

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: The Riders learn of Ryker's attack on the Edge and attempt to stop the Shellfire and keep the Dragon Eye from being reclaimed by the Hunters.

1.title: Living on the Edge

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: While trying to stabilize the volcano that threatens to destroy Dragon's Edge, the Riders discover troubling evidence of new Hunter activity.

2.title: Sandbusted

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster.

3.title: Something Rotten on Berserker Island

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Hiccup and the gang are invited to Berserker island by Daggur, only to find their dragons acting strange on the island. So when they are attacked by dragon hunters, the gang has to take them on alone, without their dragons.

5.title: A Matter of Perspective

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: The Riders follow the aging Eruptodon to the sacred Dragon Graveyard, but soon find themselves trapped by the fearsome Sentinel dragons who guard the graveyard.

6.title: Return of Thor Bonecrusher

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: The Outcast leader, Alvin, is kidnapped and held for ransom by bandits. They call on the Dragon Riders to request the assistance of Thor Bonecrusher.

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.title: No Dragon Left Behind

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: After being ambushed by aggressive Slitherwing dragons on a new island, the Riders think Stormfly has been poisoned and race to get an antidote.

11.title: Snuffnut

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon.

12.title: Searching for Oswald... And Chicken

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family.

13.title: Sins of the Past

episode of.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Trader Johann tells Heather her father may still be alive, she goes looking for him. In the end, We find out more secrets of Trader Johann and who he really is.

imdb.plot outline: Dagur the Deranged escapes from prison and ventures in the uncharted territories to build an armada against Hiccup and his Dragon Riders. Coming across a cylinder (christened "Dragon Eye") that provides information on the uncharted territories, Hiccup and his quirky team search the region looking for both Dagur and hitherto unknown species of dragons, eventually leaving Berk to build for themselves a new and distant base of operations called Dragon's Edge.
imdb.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
plot: Unlock the secrets of the Dragon Eye and come face to face with more dragons than anyone has ever imagined as Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders soar to the edge of adventure.

Dagur the Deranged escapes from prison and ventures in the uncharted territories to build an armada against Hiccup and his Dragon Riders. Coming across a cylinder (christened "Dragon Eye") that provides information on the uncharted territories, Hiccup and his quirky team search the region looking for both Dagur and hitherto unknown species of dragons, eventually leaving Berk to build for themselves a new and distant base of operations called Dragon's Edge.::statmanjeff
